text:
This is an enhancement to documentation, which I have not found anywhere on the Internet.


When processing through isapi_redirect.dll, when installed with IIS7/Windows 2008 will not log original request and original query (cs-uri-stem cs-uri-query fields) properly. The problem IS NOT IN CONNECTOR, the issue apparently has been identified by Microsoft whereas SF_NOTIFY_LOG handler is not implemented correctly on IIS7 and will fail to log changes.

From what I gathered, the issue was reported to Microsoft few months back as qfe and there is an unpublished KB article 956120 with an unpublished hotfix.

I was pointed towards talking to Microsoft support to get the hotfix before it is released to public at large.
creator: zdenek@datacrunch.net

text: After I spoke with Microsoft, they made the Hotfix available for download via http://support.microsoft.com/kb/956120
creator: zdenek@datacrunch.net

text: Thanks for the info. I have updated the connector docs (it will be in the next release) and in the meantime, this bug report is searchable.
